sentences: Jake Allston (born 1986 in Glens Falls, NY) is an American sound designer.
Jake started his professional career designing sound effects for animated television shows at Advantage Audio in 2006.
Soon thereafter, he also edited audio for reality television at Max Post (Original Productions) in 2008 on various series including Deadliest Catch and Ice Road Truckers.
According to a representative of the National Academy of Television Arts and Sciences in New York, "Allston's achievement at such a young age is remarkable.
In 2017, Jake became senior cinematic sound designer for Sony PlayStation.
